banner_batch_send_not_enabled: Article bulk sending is not enabled. You can enable it via Explore > Features > Article Bulk Send
switch_tip: After enabling, you can set rules to let AI automatically select, delete and reply to comments for bulk-sent posts in the system.
alert_support_tip: Only articles sent in bulk through this system support AI comment management and automatic deletion according to the configured rules
alert_auto_reply_tip: To enable automatic reply, you need to enable article bulk sending and create a bulk send task,
modal_article_batch_send_not_enabled: Article bulk sending is not enabled
modal_article_batch_send_not_enabled_tip: , you can enable it via Explore > Features > Article Bulk Send
checkbox_dont_remind_three_days: Do not remind again within 3 days
modal_confirm_disable_content: After closing, this feature will be disabled by default and can no longer be used. Are you sure you want to close it?
